channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed

item.title: NYT Pips hints, answers for November 15, 2025
item.description: The New York Times' latest game, Pips, brings domino fun to your desktop. How to play Pips as well as hints in case you get stuck.

item.title: NYT Connections hints today: Clues, answers for November 15, 2025
item.description: Connections is a New York Times word game that's all about finding the "common threads between words." How to solve the puzzle.

item.title: NYT Strands hints, answers for November 15, 2025
item.description: The NYT Strands hints and answers you need to make the most of your puzzling experience.

item.title: Wordle today: Answer, hints for November 15, 2025
item.description: Here's the answer for "Wordle" #1609 on November 15 as well as a few hints, tips, and clues to help you solve it yourself.

item.title: Hurdle hints and answers for November 15, 2025
item.description: Hints and answers to today's Hurdle all in one place.

item.title: Pluribus episode 3: Yes, you can actually stay at that ice hotel. Sort of.
item.description: In "Pluribus" episode 3, a flashback shows Carol and Helen staying in a hotel made of ice in Norway. But can you actually stay there IRL?
